qas.question: What are mobile markets in Mexico City called?
How is the retail market of Mexico City?
What is a common way stores are distributed in Mexico City?

answers.text: in a street dedicated to a certain type of good

qas.question: What is the spectrum of gods you can get in Mexico City?

answers.text: basic foods to ultra high-end luxury goods

context: Mexico City offers an <a1_0>immense and varied<a1_0/> consumer retail market, ranging from <a3_0>basic foods to ultra high-end luxury goods<a3_0/>. Consumers may buy in fixed indoor markets, mobile markets (<a0_0>tianguis<a0_0/>), from street vendors, from downtown shops <a2_0>in a street dedicated to a certain type of good<a2_0/>, in convenience stores and traditional neighborhood stores, in modern supermarkets, in warehouse and membership stores and the shopping centers that they anchor, in department stores, big-box stores and in modern shopping malls.
